titles: Good instrvctions for all youngmen and maids being the substance of an excellent sermon preached at St. Stevens Colmanstreet the 8 day of March 1641 : at the earnest request of divers youngmen and apprentices at a solemne thanksgiving and celebration of a fast / by Samuel Burrowes.
author: Burrowes, Samuel, 17th cent.
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
